name: A Tower, a Princess, and a Dragon
name_original: A Tower, a Princess, and a Dragon
description:
A TOWER, A PRINCESS, AND A DRAGON is a “choose your own adventure” text-based game where you climb a tower, save a princess, and slay a dragon. (It’s a story you might have heard before.)

Written by Will Ridenour

Created using Twine 2

Adventures story format by Longwelwind

UI and Icon assets by 7Soul
